front.title: Cross-device Communication Framework for AI Agents in Network Devices

abstract.t: With the development of large language models (LLM), AI Agent software continues to emerge. AI agents deployed on different network devices need to collaborate to accomplish some complex tasks, such as network measurement and network troubleshooting. This collaboration requires cross-device communication between AI agents. This document proposes a cross-device communication framework for AI agents in network devices, and analyzes the requirements for the communication protocol.
